comment.author: 64379474@N00
comment._content: This building is still around and located at Syntagma square in the center of Athens. It is now the Greek Parliament building. The square in the foreground is "Syntagma square" (constitutional square). Wikipedia link: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hellenic_Parliament Coordinates: Decimal 37.975278,23.736944 Coordinates from: stable.toolserver.org/geohack/geohack.php?pagename=Hellen...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Tilemahos Efthimiadis: Thank you for the location information for the building.  We will update the source data and reload the description.
